title: Im having trouble with purchasing RP.
body:
So yesterday i wanted to purchase some Rp for 25 euro.I fill out everything and press to finish it, but it just stays loading and it won't finish.
The message said that it can take up to 30 minutes in "rare occasions"but i waited for at least 2 hours and still nothing.
I submitted a ticket at riot support, but it's been a day and i'm not receiving a response.I tried to buy some rp today again, still nothing.Tried it from a friends's PC with a different network provider, nothing happened.
I restarted my PC, i restarted the internet connection,Tried it in admin and repaired the client and still absolutely nothing.
I''m on EUNE and i'm dire need of assistance.
Please help.

replies.body:
Issues with the store are typically caused by Internet Explorer settings, since that's what the client pulls from. Check out our [Store issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660) for a list of solutions that should help you out.

Let me know if you continue to have issues after working through those steps.
Should i still do it if Internet Explorer isnt my main browser?
Yup, regardless of which browser you decide to use, League uses Internet Explorer for its settings inside the client.
